title: 30-Day Weight Loss Plan
description: Act like a pro fitness coach. Create a comprehensive 30-day weight loss routine covering diet plan, exercise flow, and daily motivation; output as PDF.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>30-Day Weight Loss Plan</title>
  <role>Act like a pro fitness coach</role>
  <task>Create a comprehensive 30-day weight loss routine</task>

  <request>
    <task>CreateRoutine</task>
    <focus>Weight loss</focus>
    <duration unit="days">30</duration>
    <categories>
      <item>Diet Plan</item>
      <item>Exercise Flow</item>
      <item>Daily Motivation</item>
    </categories>
    <output format="pdf"/>
  </request>
</prompt>
